channel.title: Where can I get Hyperion
channel.description: [center]If this is in the wrong topic I am sorry and please move this.[/center] First off I have been looking all over for this "Hyperion" all I know of it is that it is good for coding servers and that it is seemingly hard to use. If someone can please give me a link for "Hyperion" I would appreciate it. I am looking for it because I want to make a 317 server from scratch. I have tried all other types and wanted to experiment with this.

item.title: Where can I get Hyperion
item.dc:creator: @Cyanidesuicide Cyanidesuicide
item.description:
@Cyanidesuicide wrote:

I seen this link already. Grahams Site is being remade so the link doesn’t matter anymore. That is why I made this post.

Read full topic

item.title: Where can I get Hyperion
item.dc:creator: @revengr revengr
item.description:
@revengr wrote:

While I agree with the fact that he clearly didn’t search very far, I can see how its annoying for someone to post a link to Google or Mopar’s (or SMF’s) search engine.
It’s the most useless thing I’ve ever seen.
At least 99% of Mopar users know about google.com, and the search tab is clearly visible on every possible page of the forums, twice.

Read full topic

item.title: Where can I get Hyperion
item.dc:creator: @Cyanidesuicide Cyanidesuicide
item.description:
@Cyanidesuicide wrote:

Didn’t know. And do you think I would make this post if i didn’t do some research first?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 18, 2009, 06:15:35 pm[/size][hr][quote=“jj0001, post:1, topic:320367”]request are not allowed.
try
http://www.google.com/[/quote]

You know Rule #1 says

1. All topics in this section must be requests for help on a server. Any non-server related question will be locked. Requesting a hoster, coder, or asking about a VPS also falls under being non-server related.

Last I checked I requested a link to Hyperion so I can make a server.

Read full topic
